reviewText: This is a thorough account of Chris Farley's life from birth, how he got his start, through his career and death. I'd seen this on TV and bought it because my son is a fan and wanted it for his permanent collection.

The biography was very accurate.  I had finished reading the biography by Chris Farley's brother Tom.  The book had so many details that seeing the biography seemed skimpy.  I should have seen the biography first and read the book after.
